channel.title: If you were to get a hoster
channel.description: If i was to get a hoster, how do i make it so they cant edit my source because i dont want my source to be realsed to the public. I am not allowed to get hamachi or no-ip as my parents thinks it is unsafe :(. How would i make it so knowone can edit my source?

item.title: If you were to get a hoster
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

kid?? have you been to my server? come see it before making stupid comments. grow up
or if you havnt then please have a look at my server pics and my client http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,57400.0.html

:mad:

item.title: If you were to get a hoster
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I have done that with my client and i have also tried it with my source but if you open the .class client file and search for what ever your server is called, you can also change it there. im not too sure though if you can compile…is that true?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 11:23:33 AM[/size][hr]thanks for the help coyle =P

PLEASE CLOSE!

item.title: If you were to get a hoster
item.dc:creator: @Coyle Coyle
item.description:
@Coyle wrote:

If you want someone not to be able to edit or steal your source unless they are excellent coders which most people around here are not

make a backup of your server (the one you will edit will be this one)
the one you give to hosters (you must compile it and then delete your .java files so that only leaves .class files that way they can’t edit it)

But they can still run the server…
Pretty sure this infomation is correct

thanks is appreciated

Read full topic
